thread.title: B-Town celebs will miss the 'bravest' cricketer Virender Sehwag on field
thread.title_full: B-Town celebs will miss the 'bravest' cricketer Virender Sehwag on field - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: B-Town celebs will miss the 'bravest' cricketer Virender Sehwag on field
text:
As Indian batting great Virender Sehwag announced his retirement from international cricket on Tuesday, many Bollywood celebrities like Shah Rukh Khan , Manoj Bajpayee, Anupam Kher and Paresh Rawal thanked the "bravest", "coolest" and "fearless" cricketer for several glorious moments on the field.
Sehwag, who made his ... Â»
